mapper.select: SELECT m.mt_cd, m.mt_div, m.mt_name, m.cost, m.unit, m.exp_dt, m.leadtm, m.safe_stk_rate, m.cli_cd, c.cli_name FROM mt m join cli c ON m.cli_cd = c.cli_cd WHERE m.mt_div = '원자재' ORDER BY mt_cd

SELECT m.mt_cd, m.mt_div, m.mt_name, m.cost, m.unit, case when m.exp_dt = 0 then null end as exp_dt, m.leadtm, m.safe_stk_rate, m.cli_cd, c.cli_name FROM mt m join cli c ON m.cli_cd = c.cli_cd WHERE m.mt_div = '부자재' ORDER BY mt_cd
SELECT m.mt_cd, m.mt_div, m.mt_name, m.cost, m.unit, m.exp_dt, m.leadtm, m.safe_stk_rate, m.cli_cd, c.cli_name FROM mt m join cli c ON m.cli_cd = c.cli_cd WHERE m.mt_cd = #{mtCd}
